questions.question: what type of inspection are you doing?

values.description: Wharfside requires two types of health and safety inspections to be carried out each week: exterior (communal areas) and interior (for North and South blocks)
This button is for logging weekly health and safety reports.  Wharfside requires that visual inspections are performed on the communal areas and the interiors of each block
please check that each of the external fire escapes for each block are clear and appear structurally sound
please check the lighting of pedestrian areas/walkways.  If you are able to fix it, please note the fix by selecting "fixed".
Please check for any hazards such as: trip hazards (uneven paving), broken glass, sharp objects.  If you are able to fix it, please note the fix by selecting "fixed".
please check if CCTV cameras appear undamaged and are pointed towards the correct area.
please log any evidence of damp (such as mould, discolouration of walls, peeling paint)
please log any structural issues, such as broken guttering, missing tiles, loose bricks.  If you are able to fix, please provide details of fix
please record any issues relating to bins, please log any hygiene issues, litter surrounding bins.  If you are able to resolve the issue, please mark as fixed and provide details.
please let us know which block you are inspecting
please select from each of the health and safety categories to inspect.  Please click on "done" when you have inspected each category
please check that walls, floors and stairs are clean
please check for the following: i.  Electrical: exposed wires, ii. Floor: wet, uneven, trip hazards , iii. Stairs: free of obstacles, no trip hazards
please check that ramps to/from the building are clear, that all main doors open and that fobs work
please ensure that all internal escape routes are clear and free of obstacles
Please ensure that there are fire extinguishers at each fire point and that they appear undamaged and that the last inspection date has not expired
Please check that the emergency lighting is working
Please check that all main fire doors are closed and undamaged
please check that the lights are blinking showing no fault on each of the block's smoke alarms
Please ensure that signs to all emergency exits are present and clear
please provide details on issues with the fire escape
please provide details (e.g location) of the lighting issue
please provide notes on hazards (or what you did to resolve hazards)
please provide details on issues with cctv
please provide details on damp
please provide additional details on issues with the exterior (e.g: location)
please provide further details of issues with the bin (or what you did to resolve the issue)
